conversations.body_text: Hi Essenkahn KM,  Our German warehouse has informed us that DHL is still investigating the matter, and a shipment destined for Romania has been held up. We will urge them to provide updates promptly or arrange for a replacement shipment.

Hello,  
I wait a resolution.
Thank you


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Hello,




I am writing regarding my Simsonn pedal order placed on December 13th.




Unfortunately, the entire ordering and shipping process has involved multiple issues and significant delays:



   
   - I only received the AWB on December 23rd because the postal code was missing, even though it was marked as optional during checkout.
   - After I provided the postal code, it was entered incorrectly on your side.
   - As a result, the shipment has been stuck with DHL Deutsche Post since December 24th with no progress.







Due to these repeated mistakes and the long delay caused by them, my order has not arrived as expected, and the overall experience has been quite frustrating.




Given the circumstances, I believe it is reasonable to request compensation in the form of a partial refund, discount, or a voucher for a future purchase.




I chose your products because of their reputation, and I hope this situation can be resolved in a way that reflects good customer care.




I look forward to your response and a fair solution.

Kind regatds

Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
